Output random effects estimates from SKAT.

Output random effects estimates from SKAT. $$\hat{\beta}=GZ'V^{-1}(y-X\hat\alpha)$$

G=diag($\taud$,$\Gamma$), Z=($Zd$,W)

$$V^{-1}=Vd^{-1}-Vd^{-1}WC\Gamma W'Vd^{-1}$$

  • $$Z'V^{-1}(y-X\hat\alpha)=Zd'V^{-1}(y-X\hat\alpha)+\underbrace{WV^{-1}(y-X\hat\alpha)}{\text{calculated}}$$

    • $Zd'V^{-1}(y-X\hat{\alpha})=Zd'Vd^{-1}(y-X\hat\alpha)-Zd'Vd^{-1}WC{\Gamma} W'V_d^{-1}(y-X\hat\alpha)$
    • $Z_d$ low rank
      • $Zd'Vd^{-1}(y-X\hat\alpha)=Zd'U1D{\tau}U1'(y-X\hat\alpha)+Z_d'(y-X\hat\alpha)/\sigma^2$
      • $Zd'Vd^{-1}W$
    • $Z_d$ full rank
    • $Zd'Vd^{-1}(y-X\hat\alpha)$ =$Z_d'UD^# U'(y-X\hat\alpha)$
    • $Zd'Vd^{-1}W$
Written on September 27, 2015
